Subject: Municipality of Tirana
Description: All the public buildings under the jurisdiction of the Municipality of Tirana, in which sanitary hot water needs were identified, are in the scope of this STO

Subject: Municipality of Tirana
Description: This STO applies to all buildings referred in point 1 regardless of their age, i.e., it applies to new buildings and existing buildings

Subject: Municipality of Tirana
Description: New buildings are buildings being erected for the first time or amplifications of existing buildings

Subject: Municipality of Tirana
Description: Existing buildings are buildings that will be subjected to a large rehabilitation and, or, an amplification or have energy systems for producing sanitary hot water that will be replaced and, or, rehabilitated

Subject: Municipality of Tirana
Description: The list of certified SWH systems designers will be accessible on the internet site of the Municipality of Tirana/National Agency for Natural Resources.

Subject: National Agency for Natural Resources
Description: The National Agency for Natural Resources financially supports the projects of the Municipality of Tirana.

Subject: Albania
Description: Albania partners with the Municipality of Tirana for the implementation of STO.

Subject: World Trade Organization
Description: Albania is a member of the World Trade Organization and can, therefore, access easily the EU market.

Subject: Solar Keymark
Description: The Solar Keymark contributes to the European Commission

Subject: Solar Keymark
Description: The Solar Keymark contributes to CEN

Subject: Solar Keymark
Description: The Solar Keymark contributes to ESTIF

Subject: Solar Keymark
Description: The Solar Keymark scheme encourages the further expansion of the European solar thermal market by improving market confidence in solar products.

Subject: Portuguese
Description: The buildings located in the Portuguese protected areas or belonging to the historic patrimony are exempt of the thermal regulation (which imposes the use of SWH systems to produce SHW).

Subject: Lisbon
Description: The context of the urban requalification of the Lisbon down‐town
